summary: Stylish ex-con Modesty Blaise and her partner Willie Garvin are tasked by the British Secret Service with preventing her rival Gabriel from stealing diamonds that are to be delivered to her adoptive father, a Sheikh.

keywords: spy|spy spoof|based on comic strip|diamond|action heroine
title: Modesty Blaise, superagente femenino
